mapper.select: select a.id,a.project_no,a.project_name,a.contract_date,a.project_type,a.status,a.company_id ,a.construct_company,a.company_bid,a.contract_date,a.province,a.city,a.county,a.detail_address,a.built_type from maoding_web_project a where a.pstatus='0' and a.id=#{id} limit 1

select if(built_type.id is null,null,1) as is_default, if(find_in_set(built_type.id,project.built_type),1,0) as is_selected, built_type.type_name as name, built_type.* from maoding_web_project project inner join md_type_built_const built_type
project.pstatus = '0'
and find_in_set(project.id,#{id})
and project.id in
#{projectId}

select if(built_type.id is null,null,0) as is_default, if(find_in_set(built_type.id,project.built_type),1,0) as is_selected, built_type.type_name as name, built_type.* from maoding_web_project project inner join md_type_built_custom built_type on (find_in_set(built_type.id,project.built_type))
project.pstatus = '0'
and find_in_set(project.id,#{id})
and project.id in
#{projectId}

select project_list.project_name as project_name, concat(company_creator.company_name,'/',user_creator.user_name) as project_creator, project_list.* from maoding_web_project project_list inner join maoding_web_company company_creator on (company_creator.id = project_list.company_id) inner join maoding_web_account user_creator on (user_creator.id = project_list.create_by) left join maoding_web_company company_second on (company_second.id = project_list.company_bid) left join maoding_web_project_task_relation cooperator_list on (cooperator_list.relation_status = '0' and cooperator_list.project_id = project_list.id) left join maoding_web_company company_relation on (company_relation.id = cooperator_list.from_company_id or company_relation.id = cooperator_list.to_company_id) where project_list.pstatus = '0'
and (addDate(#{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},1) > ifnull(project_list.project_create_date,project_list.create_date))
and (ifnull(project_list.project_create_date,project_list.create_date) >= #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
and (company_creator.id = #{companyId} or company_second.id = #{companyId} or company_relation.id = #{companyId})
group by project_list.id order by ifnull(project_list.project_create_date,project_list.create_date) desc

select distinct
project_list.company_bid as id, part_b_company.company_name as name
project_list.project_type as id, project_list.project_type as name
project_list.company_id as id, create_company.company_name as name
relation_company.id as id, relation_company.company_name as name
member_list.company_user_id as id, member_list.user_name as name
null as id, null as name
from maoding_web_project project_list inner join md_project_member member_list on ( member_list.project_id = project_list.id
and member_list.member_type = 1
and member_list.member_type = 7
and member_list.member_type = 2
and member_list.member_type = 8
and member_list.is_task_leader = 1
and member_list.is_task_designer = 1
and member_list.is_task_checker = 1
and member_list.is_task_auditor = 1
and member_list.company_id = #{currentCompanyId}
and member_list.user_id = #{accountId}
)
inner join maoding_web_company part_b_company on (part_b_company.status = '0' and part_b_company.id = project_list.company_bid)
inner join maoding_web_company create_company on (create_company.status = '0' and create_company.id = project_list.company_id)
inner join maoding_web_project_task issue_task ON ( issue_task.task_status = '0' and issue_task.is_operater_task = 1 and issue_task.from_company_id = member_list.company_id ) inner join maoding_web_company relation_company on (relation_company.status = '0' and relation_company.id = issue_task.company_id)
where project_list.pstatus = '0'

select group_concat(distinct if(team_member.member_type=1,concat(team_member.user_name,','),'') separator '') as busPersonInCharge, group_concat(distinct if(team_member.member_type=7,concat(team_member.user_name,','),'') separator '') as busPersonInChargeAssistant, group_concat(distinct if(team_member.member_type=2,concat(team_member.user_name,','),'') separator '') as designPersonInCharge, group_concat(distinct if(team_member.member_type=8,concat(team_member.user_name,','),'') separator '') as designPersonInChargeAssistant, group_concat(distinct if(team_member.is_task_leader,concat(team_member.user_name,','),'') separator '') as taskLeader, group_concat(distinct if(team_member.is_task_designer,concat(team_member.user_name,','),'') separator '') as designer, group_concat(distinct if(team_member.is_task_checker,concat(team_member.user_name,','),'') separator '') as checker, group_concat(distinct if(team_member.is_task_auditor,concat(team_member.user_name,','),'') separator '') as auditor, group_concat(distinct if(relation_company.id is not null,concat(relation_company.company_name,','),'') separator '') as relationCompany, project_list.* from maoding_web_project project_list inner join md_project_member member_list on ( member_list.project_id = project_list.id
and member_list.user_id = #{accountId}
and member_list.company_id = #{currentCompanyId}
) inner join md_project_member team_member on ( team_member.project_id = project_list.id
and ((team_member.member_type = 1 and team_member.company_user_id != #{busPersonInCharge}) or (team_member.member_type != 1))
and ((team_member.member_type = 7 and team_member.company_user_id != #{busPersonInChargeAssistant}) or (team_member.member_type != 7))
and ((team_member.member_type = 2 and team_member.company_user_id != #{designPersonInCharge}) or (team_member.member_type != 2))
and ((team_member.member_type = 8 and team_member.company_user_id != #{designPersonInChargeAssistant}) or (team_member.member_type != 8))
and ((team_member.is_task_leader and team_member.company_user_id != #{taskLeader}) or (!team_member.is_task_leader))
and ((team_member.is_task_designer and team_member.company_user_id != #{designer}) or (!team_member.is_task_designer))
and ((team_member.is_task_checker and team_member.company_user_id != #{checker}) or (!team_member.is_task_checker))
and ((team_member.is_task_auditor and team_member.company_user_id != #{auditor}) or (!team_member.is_task_auditor))
) left join maoding_web_project_task issue_task ON ( issue_task.task_status = '0' and issue_task.is_operater_task = 1 and issue_task.from_company_id = member_list.company_id ) inner join maoding_web_company relation_company on (relation_company.status = '0' and relation_company.id = issue_task.company_id)
group by project_list.id
